# Caio Kinzel Filho

> Software engineer based on the Sunshine Coast, Australia. Specializes in architecture, event-driven systems, and engineering teams. This is a personal portfolio and technical blog.

## About

Caio is a software engineer with expertise in:

- Architecture for rapid scaling: Designing systems that ship fast while preventing technical debt paralysis
- Data architecture as business strategy: Building data models that force clarity about what matters
- Technical foundation as hiring accelerant: Establishing standards and frameworks that make scaling frictionless
- AI-augmented team productivity: Building LLM-driven workflows that turn engineers into force multipliers

## Pages

- [About](/about): Personal introduction, location, specialties, and technical capabilities
- [Experience](/experience): Professional work history and career timeline
- [Tech Radar](/tech-radar): Personal technology radar showing tools, techniques, platforms, and languages with adoption recommendations (adopt, trial, assess, hold)
- [DevLog](/devlog): Technical blog with articles on software engineering, architecture, and development practices

## Content Structure

The site is a Vue 3 single-page application. The Tech Radar visualizes technology choices using the Thoughtworks radar format with four quadrants (Techniques, Tools, Platforms, Languages & Frameworks) and four rings (Adopt, Trial, Assess, Hold). The DevLog contains markdown articles with tags for categorization.
